items: Place the Tiger Tail Neck on a flat surface, such as a table or the floor.
Position yourself so that you are sitting or standing comfortably next to the Tiger Tail Neck.
Place the Tiger Tail Neck on the back of your neck, with the two massage balls on either side of your spine.
Slowly move your head up and down, allowing the massage balls to roll along your neck muscles.
Repeat this motion for 1-2 minutes, or until you feel your neck muscles start to relax.
If desired, you can also move the Tiger Tail Neck to other areas of your neck and shoulders to target different muscle groups.
When finished, gently remove the Tiger Tail Neck from your neck and store it in a safe place.
Relieves tension and stiffness in the neck muscles
Improves range of motion in the neck
Reduces headaches and migraines caused by neck tension
Increases blood flow to the neck and head
Can be done anywhere, anytime without equipment
